rules.description: Right control by holding semicolon key. Regular semicolon when pressed alone
Mouse Keys Mode v4 (rev 1)
Map Left Control + Left Command + J to return
Map Left Control + Left Command +  semicolon to delete
Caps Lock's: Esc when alone, LCMD+LCtrl when holded, LCtrl when double tap and holded
Control key by holding tab key. Regular tab key when pressed alone
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Vi Mode [S as Trigger Key]
Change left command key to control + option if pressed with other keys
Map Hyper Key + ; to delete
Map Hyper + U to acute accent
Map Hyper + I to tilde accent
Map Hyper + O to circunflex accent
Map Hyper + P to grave accent
Map Hyper + ' to cedilla
Map Ctrl + Option + Q to Command + W
Map Ctrl + Shift + Option + Q to Command + Q
Map Hyper + J to return
Map Hyper Key + L to delete forward
Vi Mode [D as Trigger Key] (recommended)
Change Caps Lock to Hyper Key. (Post Esc key when pressed alone)
caps_lock to esc when pressed alone, to hyper key 1 when held
left cmd -> cmd+tab
press f and j simultaneously to f16
(Vim 1/11) caps_lock -> on, caps_lock, enter, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off

to_if_alone.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'

rules.description: (Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off
(Vim 3/11) visual mode + h,j,k,l,e,b,0,^,$,gg,G,{,} + d,y,c,x

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Press [v] again to go back to Vim Mode" with title "-- VISUAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'

rules.description: (Vim 4/11) dd,de,db,d0,d^,d$,dgg,dG,d{,d}
(Vim 5/11) yy,ye,yb,y0,y^,y$,ygg,yG,y{,y}
(Vim 6/11) cc,ce,cb,c0,c^,c$,cgg,cG,c{,c}
(Vim 7/11) x,X,p,P,u,control+r
(Vim 8/11) h,j,k,l (+ control/option/command/shift),e,b,0,^,$,gg,G,{,}
(Vim 9/11) i,I,a,A,o,O
(Vim 10/11) s,m,spacebar -> Hammerspoon modals
(Vim 11/11) disable unused keys
